rules.name: No3
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 ) AND (16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19 OR 20 OR 21 OR 22 OR 23 OR 24 OR 25 OR 26 OR 27 OR 28 OR 29) OR 4

rules.name: Conditions_to_Check_for_LeadAssignment
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 3 AND 2 AND (4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7)) OR (1 AND 2 AND 3)
rules.label: Conditions to Check for LeadAssignment
